answerText: Sanford "Sandy" Koufax [accept Sanford Braun][10] Sandy Koufax pitched for this team that played at Ebbets Field in Brooklyn before moving to California. They filed for bankruptcy in June.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 7 | 4 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This man did not pitch in the first game of the 1965 World Series as it was Yom Kippur. For 10 points each: [10] Name this pitcher who held the record for the most no-hitters with 4 before it was broken by Nolan Ryan. He was forced to retire at age 30 due to arthritis.
